ns2:sqlResource.query: SELECT service_billingid.row_id, service.cp_service_name, service_billingid.service_id, service_billingid.billing_id, billingid.billing_price, billingid.h3g_billing_priceband, billingid.tim_id_price, billingid.tim_mpay_fraction_id, service_billingid.wind_bill_service_type FROM service_billingid left outer join service on service.service_id = service_billingid.service_id left outer join billingid on billingid.billing_id = service_billingid.billing_id
